alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Mountains; Santa Barbara County South Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 06 at 5:39AM PST until March 07 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 50 mph favored foothills. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County South Coast and Santa Barbara County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes Highways 101 and 154, as well as the Gaviota and San Marcos Passes. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds may become localized later this morning and early this afternoon, but winds will strengthen again late this afternoon through late tonight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Mountains; Santa Barbara County South Coast
